DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this clinical research study is to determine whether apixaban will be safe in people who have recently had unstable angina or a heart attack.
DOC.brief_title: Safety Study of Apixaban in Recent Acute Coronary Syndrome
DOC.criteria: Key Recent (< = 7 days) Acute Coronary Syndrome (ACS). Clinically stable on optimal treatment Key High bleeding risk. Ongoing anticoagulant use. Need for chronic (>3 months) daily nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug (NSAID) or chronic high dose acetylsalicylic acid (ASA) use (>325 mg/day
